title: Woman escaped cinderblock cell, flagged down help after being held by man who may have other victims, FBI says
description: A "violent sex assault offender" accused of holding a kidnapped woman captive in a makeshift cinderblock cell in his Oregon garage may have other victims, the FBI said Wednesday.

title: Mike Pence attacks Trump as unfit for the presidency and denounces his 'crackpot lawyers'
description: Mike Pence attacks Trump as unfit for the presidency and denounces his 'crackpot lawyers'

title: What Fitch's downgrade of the U.S. government means for taxpayers and consumers
description: The U.S. had its credit rating downgraded by ratings agency Fitch on Tuesday.

title: U.S. Capitol Police searching Senate office buildings after unconfirmed report of active shooter
description: Latest news and updates on U.S. Capitol Police confirming they are searching Senate office building after a call about an active shooter.

title: Biden acknowledged his 7th grandchild after getting the 'green light' from his son
description: President Joe Biden has told people close to him that he hopes to eventually meet Hunter Biden’s four-year-old daughter, Navy Jones.

title: China floats two-hour daily limit of smartphone screen time for kids
description: Chinese regulators have proposed rules that would limit the smartphone screen time of people under the age of 18 to a maximum of two hours per day.

title: NJ cop sentenced to prison for killing nurse with car and driving the body home
description: Louis Santiago was sentenced to five years in prison for striking and killing a nurse with his car, driving the body home and then returning to the scene after speaking to his parents.

title: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau announces separation from wife Sophie Grégoire Trudeau
description: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau announced on Wednesday that he and his wife, Sophie Grégoire Trudeau, are separating.

title: What Trump's latest indictment tells us about the GOP presidential field
description: Trump’s GOP rivals are using the moment to divulge more than ever about their views on the powers of the presidency and the courts.

title: Jury reaches verdict in death penalty case for Pittsburgh synagogue mass shooter
description: PITTSBURGH — Federal jurors reached a verdict Wednesday in the sentencing of Robert Gregory Bowers, who was convicted after killing 11 worshippers and wounding seven others at a synagogue nearly five years ago in the most heinous antisemitic attack in U.S. history.

title: 1 dead and more than 50 injured after bus rolls over at Grand Canyon West
description: One person is dead and more than 50 are injured after a bus rolled over at Grand Canyon West on Tuesday morning, officials said.

title: Woman accused of killing bride in DUI golf cart crash must remain in custody, S.C. judge orders
description: A woman accused of killing a bride when she crashed into a newlywed couple’s golf cart while allegedly driving under the influence must remain in custody as she awaits trial, a South Carolina judge ordered Tuesday.

title: Rudy Giuliani and Sidney Powell appear to be among alleged Trump co-conspirators
description: The indictment of Donald Trump over the 2020 election includes six unnamed co-conspirators. They appear to include Rudy Giuliani, Sidney Powell, and others.

title: 5 things to know about the special counsel’s indictment of Donald Trump
description: Five takeaways from Jack Smith's indictment of Donald Trump in connection to the 2020 election.
